summary: Ryan Willburn (Stephen Baldwin), a Green War rebel Agent sent on a mission to collect evidence against the Confederate Central Government, for its heinous crimes. The mission quickly turns chaotic when he meets Tuag (Neva Leoni), a mutant survivor.
cast: Danny Glover|Daryl Hannah|Michael Madsen|Stephen Baldwin|Rutger Hauer|Neva Leoni|Kai Portman|Timothy Martin|Benjamin Stender|Maurizio Tesei|Mario Opinato|Marco Bonini|Maggie Parto|Riccardo Cicogna
title: 2047: Sights of Death
